short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hotseat Notification is a plugin designed for the Hotseat education platform.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hotseat Notification is a plugin designed specifically for the Hotseat education platform, aiming to provide real-time notification capabilities for teachers. It enables quick and efficient interaction and communication between teachers and students during classroom sessions.
